Articles.Content:
Hi! i didn't know where to post it so i put it here

 

I'm trying to use github to host a kopernicus planet pack and i have been unable to move images into the plugindata folder. i cannot rename the file so what do i do? thanks in advance
Do you know the basics of how Git/GitHub works?  Also, I'm not exactly sure what you need help with.  Can you elaborate more?

I uploaded images from my computer which were put in the main directory, but I need them in a sub folder to enable on demand loading. I know renaming a file can move it but it will not allow me to change the name of a picture. No I don't know the basics of github :/.

EDIT: I meant I just need to know how to put pictures in a folder

Edited June 28, 2016 by Kepler68
